name: Social Warrior
description:
Social Warrior is not only a GAME its a tribute to all front line warriors who are fighting the nation-wide public-health crisis, We are honoring all front-line fighters -doctors, nurses, police, CISF, cleaners – Keeping us safe. All legends are deployed for enforcement of the medical emergency in the length and breadth of the country.

fear is spreading faster so we created this game where you have a fight against it and Win. We believe that we will win sooner or later but we always have to remember to thanks Real Warriors out there still fighting.

Thank you, warriors! It’s immense to see the service that you have provided. We are safe, credit goes to all the front line workers. Thank you so much!
